casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Jude FRANCIS, Appellant. Motion No: 2017-1230 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on January 9, 2018

Motion by New York State Board of Examiners of Sex Offenders for leave to file a brief amicus curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. The brief must be submitted in digital format within seven days.
